name: Words Dancer
description:
Inspiration:
Super Hot : Time moves when you move
Bullet Hell: Running out of space
Scramble Words



Objective: 
defeat all enemies, become the champion.



Rules:
0. time moves when you move
1. erase enemies to win
2.letters are deadly to touch, except those in the reward word
3.collect a word to get a reward
(if LOVE is target word, L, O, V, E are harmless to you, collide to collect a word)



Controls:
0. wasd
1. left mouse hold
2."space" teleport to shadow



Credits:
Music: Curious Jungle by  Podington Bear
Others: Ango
